holidays.title: National Skyscraper Day
holidays.description: We invite you to join us in taking a long look up.

holidays.title: Foundation Day in San Marino
holidays.description: Revel in the festivities and commemorate the beginning of the Republic of San Marino!

holidays.title: Franchise Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let’s help each other by honoring this day and supporting our local franchises.

holidays.title: International Bacon Day
holidays.description: Let’s go hog-wild and enjoy more of this delicious, sizzling American staple.

holidays.title: Merchant Navy Day
holidays.description: Observe the day and recognize the sacrifices of the often forgotten merchant seafarers.

holidays.title: National Doodle Day
holidays.description: Check out some National Doodle Day celebration ideas that we're really drawn to.

holidays.title: National Hummingbird Day
holidays.description: It seems more and more people are excited about seeing Hummingbirds than their favorite celebrities.

holidays.title: National Stephen Day
holidays.description: Find out the true meaning behind the name as we mark National Stephen Day.

holidays.title: National Tailgating Day
holidays.description: Good food, great company, and a lot of fun are reasons to enjoy this national pastime.

holidays.title: National Welsh Rarebit Day
holidays.description: Warning! You’re about to experience a delicious melted-cheese overload, are you ready?

holidays.title: Turkey Vulture Day
holidays.description: Help raise awareness of the importance of vulture conservation at this year’s celebration.

holidays.title: US Bowling League Day
holidays.description: Find out more about this popular game that’s loved by millions of people.

holidays.title: World Beard Day
holidays.description: Bushy, trimmed, or closely manicured, the beard remains supreme and we’re here to celebrate it.

holidays.title: Yamashita Surrender Day
holidays.description: Honor the fallen soldiers who fought for the Philippines’ peace and order on Yamashita Surrender Day.

holidays.title: August Alsina’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer is creating his legacy one song at a time.

holidays.title: DJ Envy’s Birthday
holidays.description: New York Radio and hip-hop aren’t complete without D.J. Envy. He’s a prominent musical influence.

holidays.title: Kaia Gerber’s Birthday
holidays.description: At a young age, this famous star made a name for herself in the modeling industry.

holidays.title: Park Soo-young’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this famous and talented singer, actress, and dancer, the sky's the limit.

holidays.title: Riley Hubatka’s Birthday
holidays.description: The sky is the limit for this talented social media celebrity and TikTok star.
